Key Match Events: Bowden Francis took a no-hitter into the sixth inning.
Bowden Francis pitched seven shutout innings with five strikeouts.
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit an RBI double in the third inning.
Ernie Clement hit an RBI double in the sixth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager John Schneider praised Francis for his control and pitch mix.
Bowden Francis reflected on his approach to pitching and his recent success.
Brian Serven commented on Francis' efficiency and control.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blue Jays earned a split of the four-game series against the Red Sox.
